title: Title
notify-me: Be notified of new replies in this post
delete-event-confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this event?
wrote-on: wrote on
replied-to-user-ago: replied to %3
replied-to-user-on: replied to %3 on
bookmark-instructions: Click here to return to the last read comment in this thread.
merged-message: This post has been merged into %2
forked-message: This post was forked from %2
deleted-message: This post has been deleted. Only users with post management privileges can see it.
following-topic.message: You will now be receiving notifications when somebody comments on this post.
not-following-topic.message: You will see this post in the unread posts list, but you will not receive notifications when somebody comments on this post.
ignoring-topic.message: You will no longer see this post in the unread posts list. You will be notified when you are mentioned or your comment is up voted.
login-to-subscribe: Please register or log in in order to subscribe to this post.
markAsUnreadForAll.success: Post marked as unread for all.
watch.title: Be notified of new replies in this post
unwatch.title: Stop watching this post
watching.description:
Notify me of new replies.
Show post in unread.
not-watching.description:
Do not notify me of new replies.
Show post in unread if category is not ignored.
ignoring.description:
Do not notify me of new replies.
Do not show post in unread.
thread-tools.title: Post Tools
thread-tools.delete-confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this post?
thread-tools.restore-confirm: Are you sure you want to restore this post?
thread-tools.purge-confirm: Are you sure you want to purge this post?
topic-move-success: This post will be moved to "%1" shortly. Click here to undo.
topic-move-multiple-success: These posts will be moved to "%1" shortly. Click here to undo.
topic-move-all-success: All posts will be moved to "%1" shortly. Click here to undo.
topic-move-posts-success: Comments will be moved shortly. Click here to undo.
post-delete-confirm: Are you sure you want to delete this comment?
post-restore-confirm: Are you sure you want to restore this comment?
post-purge-confirm: Are you sure you want to purge this comment?
pin-modal-help: You can optionally set an expiration date for the pinned post(s) here. Alternatively, you can leave this field blank to have the post stay pinned until it is manually unpinned.
bookmarks.has-no-bookmarks: You haven't bookmarked any comments yet.
fork-topic-instruction: Click the comments you want to fork, enter a title for the new post and click fork post
fork-success: Successfully forked post! Click here to go to the forked post.
delete-posts-instruction: Click the comments you want to delete/purge
merge-topics-instruction: Click the posts you want to merge or search for them
merge-topic-list-title: List of posts to be merged
move-posts-instruction: Click the comments you want to move then enter a post ID or go to the target post
move-topic-instruction: Select the target category and then click move
change-owner-instruction: Click the comments you want to assign to another user
manage-editors-instruction: Manage the users who can edit this comment below.
composer.thumb-title: Add a thumbnail to this post
stale.title: Create new post instead?
stale.warning: The post you are replying to is quite old. Would you like to create a new post instead, and reference this one in your reply?
diffs.title: Comment Edit History
diffs.description: This comment has %1 revisions. Click one of the revisions below to see the comment content at that point in time.
diffs.restore-description: A new revision will be appended to this comment's edit history after restoring.
diffs.post-restored: Comment successfully restored to earlier revision
no-more-next-post: You don't have more comments in this post
